pr_title: Add docker image instructions for CircleCI

timeline.message: Add docker image instructions for CircleCI

timeline.bodyText: I don’t think you need r2c here styled this way, otherwise we’ll have to style all of them like this in these instructions, in the card views, etc.
timeline.author: pabloest
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -70,6 +70,21 @@ jobs:
 This will default to using the [`r2c` rule pack](https://semgrep.live/p/r2c).

timeline.bodyText: Is there a particular advantage to using one vs. the other? Or why list this one after the circleci/python example?
timeline.author: pabloest
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -70,6 +70,21 @@ jobs:
 This will default to using the [`r2c` rule pack](https://semgrep.live/p/r2c).
 To choose another rule pack see https://semgrep.live/packs.
 
+Another way to do it is to use the official Semgrep [Docker Image](https://hub.docker.com/r/returntocorp/semgrep)
